original_text: And I will set my face against that man, and will make him a sign and a proverb, and I will cut him off from the midst of my people; and ye shall know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 그 사람을 대적하여 그들을 놀라움과 표징과 속담 거리가 되게 하여 내 백성 가운데에서 끊으리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: And I will set my face against that man
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 사람을 대항하여 내 얼굴을 향하게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and will make him a sign and a proverb
and I will cut him off from the midst of my people
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 백성 중에서 그를 끊어버릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: and ye shall know that I am the Lord
